item.title: About
item.author: beck@frecologic.com (Beck Frydenborg)
item.description: “We pass through this world but once.” ~ Stephen Jay Gould Iâ€™m an environmental consultant specializing in water science and policy in Florida. My main interests are in using data analysis and visualizations to help clients in the private, public, and nonprofit sectors fulfil their missions and goals while protecting water quality and human health. I’ll write about some of that work here. In my spare time I enjoy cycling, hiking, and photography.
